ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Re: Freedome For All:) Please Read
ygData.msgSnippet: /ooc WOOT DING ... __________________________________________________ Do you Yahoo!? Y! Web Hosting - Let the expert host your web site
ygData.messageBody:
/ooc WOOT DING


--- ravens_sorrows <no_reply@yahoogroups.com> wrote:
> --- In theeverquesttavern@y..., "Mari"
> <Magickal-Mari@c...> wrote:
> > Freedom of Religion Means Any Religion
> >
> > View Current Signatures - Sign the Petition
> > http://www.petitiononline.com/MMoon/
> >
> > To: The Salisbury Post, North Carolina
> > We, the undersigned, are outraged at the refusal
> of a request to
> list
> > a Pagan/Wiccan Study Group - Magickal Moon in the
> Salisbury Post,
> > which is located in Salisbury, North Carolina. The
> reason given
> for
> > the request by the FAITH Copy Editor was both
> ignorant and
> > discriminatory. "The Salisbury Post FAITH section
> is for people
> who
> > believe in God" and "this is not the image that
> The Post wants to
> > portray."
> >
> > The Salisbury Post's mission statement says in
> part:
> > "We are a marketing and customer driven company
> whose mission is
> to
> > inform, educate and entertain. We strive to mirror
> the unique
> > communities we serve and offer responsible public
> forum."
> >
> > We fail to see how denying a Pagan/Wiccan study
> group an equal
> space
> > with other congregations fulfills this mission
> statement. The
> > decision was made with personal prejudices and not
> handled with a
> > professional demeanor.
> >
> > Regardless of whether or not Paganism is The
> Salisbury Post's
> > religion, it is our religion. The Federal
> Government recognizes
> > Paganism/Wicca, as an official religion. Military
> Courts of
> Justice
> > in the U.S. have also found Wicca to be a valid
> religion,
> deserving
> > of protection under the First Amendment of the
> U.S. Constitution.
> In
> > the case United States v. Phillips, (42 M.J. 346)
> in 1995) the
> > concurring opinion by Judge Wiss stated: "First,
> Wicca is a
> socially
> > recognized religion. It is acknowledged as such by
> the Army.
> > See `Dept. of the Army (DA) Pamphlet 165-13-1,
> Religious
> Requirements
> > and Practices of Certain Selected Groups: A
> Handbook for
> Chaplains'
> > (April 1980), revising A Pamphlet 165-13,
> `Religious Requirements
> and
> > Practices of Certain Selected Groups: A Handbook
> for Chaplains'
> > (April 1978). Further, it is acknowledged as such
> in courts of
> law."
> >
> > Pagans and Wiccans are a part of your community.
> We are your
> > neighbors, your coworkers, your children's
> teachers; we are
> > professionals, but most importantly we are your
> readers - your
> > customers! As engraved on your building and
> imprinted on the
> > Opinion/Editorial page of the paper "The truth
> shall make you
> free";
> > misconceptions about pagans, and being denied
> access to public
> forum
> > makes it all the more difficult for the truth to
> make any of us
> free.
> >
> > Due to the fact that this request was handled in
> an unprofessional
> > manner and with personal bigotry, we, the
> undersigned, as well as
> > members of our family and friends, who are both of
> the Christian
> and
> > Pagan faith will not support The Salisbury Post.
> We will no longer
> be
> > a part of your readership until this matter is
> reconciled with a
> > formal apology and the list is made public in The
> Salisbury Post.
> >
> >
> >
> > "We are not evil. We don't harm or seduce people.
> We are not
> > dangerous. We are ordinary people like you. We
> have families,
> jobs,
> > hopes, and dreams. We are not a cult. This
> religion is not a joke.
> We
> > are not what you think we are from looking at T.V.
> We are real. We
> > laugh, we cry. We are serious. We have a sense of
> humor. You don't
> > have to be afraid of us. We don't want to convert
> you. And please
> > don't try to convert us. Just give us the same
> right we give you--
> to
> > live in peace. We are much more similar to you
> than you think." -
> > Margot Adler
> >
> > Sincerely,
> >
> > The Undersigned
> > http://www.petitiononline.com/MMoon/
> >
> > Love & Blessings!
> >
> > Mari
> > http://profiles.yahoo.com/magickal_mari
> Whiney little buggers aren't they? (I can't have
> this and that's
> against the rules so I'm gonna cry about it until I
> make you so sick
> of hearing me whine you'll beg me to shut up....SO
> SHUT UP ALREADY!)
>
>
